caption.p:
Case 4 results for varying m S . Optimal choices through time for; ( a) proportion vaccinated ( u 1) in a central hub settlement, ( b) vector control ( u 2) in a central hub settlement, ( c) proportion vaccinated ( u 1) in an outer town settlement, ( d) vector control ( u 2) in an outer town settlement, for different values of host movement ( m
S ). Here, n = 5 and costs were set at C 1 = 510, C 2 = 4000 and C 3 = 400.
